title: $:/plugins/commons/file-uploads-github
author: Saq Imtiaz
name: File Uploads: Github
description: Github uploader for uploading binary files to external storage
readme:
''Experimental'' proof of concept Github uploader module for the File Uploads plugin. Saves uploads to Github for use with Github pages. Based on the Octokat library. Requires that credentials have been filled in for the [[Github saver|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Saving/GitHub]].

Intended for use with wikis hosted on Github Pages. 

Please see:

* The [[terms of service and guidelines|https://docs.github.com/en/pages/getting-started-with-github-pages/about-github-pages]] for using Github Pages. 
* How to for [[hosting a TiddlyWiki on Github Pages|https://kookma.github.io/TW5-GitHub-Saver/]].
